pr_title: Extract capture config from grok patterns up front

timeline.message:
Extract capture config from grok patterns up front

This extracts the configuration for extracting values from a groked
string when building the grok expression to do two things:
1. Create a method exposing that configuration on `Grok` itself which
   will be used grok `grok` flavored runtime fields.
2. Marginally speed up extracting grok values by skipping a little
   string manipulation.

timeline.bodyText: This didn't need to be public and it confused me that it was.
timeline.author: nik9000

timeline.bodyText: This feels private, but it is used by tests. I tightened the visibility while I was there, but not didn't refactor a bunch of tests.
timeline.author: nik9000

timeline.bodyText: Moved this into the two new classes.
timeline.author: nik9000
